nodes.excerpt: Lullaby helps treat Tinnitus, a condition that makes you hear a very annoying sound for the rest of your life. Most of the ENTs I checked with seemed poorly prepared to help their patients with the stress, so the app teaches you a healthy way to do that.

nodes.title: Kanda - Affirm for general contractors

nodes.excerpt: NexStem Headset and Wisdom SDK allows you to capture high quality EEG data and process them in real-time to give predictions about what you are thinking, and then deploy that to a device or application to control them using nothing but your thoughts.
nodes.title: NexStem Headset & Wisdom SDK - Develop and deploy mind-controlled devices and applications

nodes.excerpt: Want to expand your social network and meet interesting people online? Join ChitterChat and be matched one time per week with someone to speak to 1 on 1. Having Twitter will speed up the waiting time dramatically as we can verify you're a real person.
nodes.title: ChitterChat - Speak to 1 new person every week

nodes.excerpt: Plasma.Finance is DeFi dashboard which aggregates the most popular DeFi protocols from different blockchains and allows users to manage their DeFi portfolio in one simple interface. You can trade and buy any ERC20 tokens with your Coinbase or Metamask wallet.
nodes.title: Plasma Finance - The easiest way to invest in DeFi & manage crypto portfolio
